Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Peiren Sterckx Goossens at a corporate retreat in Brussels. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Peiren Sterckx Goossens is a 50 year old Editor from Belgium. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Peiren Sterckx Goossens is currently divorced. His child is named Ingrid.
Education Background:
Peiren earned his secondary school diploma from Atheneum Antwerpen in 1992.
Peiren earned his degree from Vrije Universiteit Brussel in 1998.
Occupation History:
Peiren Sterckx Goossens is a seasoned professional with over 26 years of experience.
In 1999, Peiren Sterckx Goossens started working as a Journalist at Medialaan NV, marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 2003, he moved to Vlaamse Radio- en Televisieomroeporganisatie (VRT) to work as a Editor, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 340000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns flat in Turnhout, where he resides. It is worth 1061000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns flat in Li√®ge worth 910000 EUR.


Following the passing of his mother, a successful Private Equity Manager, he received an inheritance of 1310000 EUR in 2014, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Peiren as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
